comment.author: 48889055628@N01
comment._content: Author of A Vagabond in New York. His name is very similar to the real name of the author Ford Madox Ford, who was born Ford Hermann Hueffer, although I can't find that they are related.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: They were brothers. I have started a biography at Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oliver_Madox_Hueffer
